name: George and the Dragon
description:
George and the Dragon

Every year, the villagers of Greymarsh appease a dragon by choosing a sacrifice and leaving her handcuffed at the top of a hill. After the dragon comes, the girl is gone, and the handcuffs are open on the ground. Everyone knows that part of the story of St George. So... the dragon has a key and turns it with its claws? That doesn’t make sense.

George would be the first to laugh if he knew he was going to end up as England’s patron saint. He can still save the princess and his village from the dragon, though, if he can solve the mysteries in time.

This interactive visual novel has twenty-six possible endings. George and the princess will need a little help from you, to get them their fairy tale ending.
